stratezy.title: Founder & Product Lead, Stratezy (AI Roadmap SaaS)
stratezy.description: Developing an AI-powered roadmap and PRD automation platform for product teams. Designed and built the entire system — including backend (NestJS, MongoDB), frontend (Vue), and DevOps (Docker, Nginx, VPS) — fully end-to-end. Implemented multi-stage machine learning models for story point prediction, sprint duration forecasting, and PRD scoring using Python and LLM pipelines. Integrated Jira and Confluence APIs for automated roadmap intelligence. Launched live demo on stratezy.net.
